data.quote: If you enjoy what you are doing, you may work long hours, but it wonâ€™t seem like work at all. It will look like play.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: A man can succeed at almost anything for which he has unlimited enthusiasm.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Stay out of work or activities where the chances are only one out of ten of being able to make a living.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Ask individuals or friends working in the industry you are interested in joining to obtain further information before deciding to devote your life to it.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Tracking and keeping tabs on your expenses
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Create passive or alternate sources of income
data.author: Dale Carneige
